data_source: Eurostat Tourist Nights Spent â†’ Tourism Load Ratio
description: Tourism load ratio calculated from tourist nights spent divided by local population
seasonal_info: Includes monthly multipliers for seasonal variation (summer peaks, winter lows)

schema.tourist_nights_annual: integer - Total tourist nights spent annually
schema.population: integer - City population for ratio calculation
schema.seasonal_multipliers: object - Monthly tourism variation factors (1.0 = average)
schema.last_updated: string - ISO date of last update
